name: indm
body: |- wceq(cdif(universe, cin(c0, c1)), cun(cdif(universe, c0), cdif(universe, c1)))

body.origin: |- wceq(cdif(universe, cin(c0, c1)), cun(cdif(universe, c0), cdif(universe, c1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wceq(cdif(universe, cin(c0, c1)), cun(cdif(universe, c0), cdif(universe, c1)))

comment: De Morgan's law for intersection. Theorem 5.2(13') of [Stoll] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2004.)
